content_descriptors.notes:
Tamer: King of Dinosaurs is a dinosaur themed adventure game with fort and relationship building. During the course of the game, the player will be able to romance four unique alien women.
- Dialogue around love, sex, and procreating that may not be suitable for those under the age of 18.
- Clothed kissing and hugging.
- Skimpy and revealing outfits.
- Consensual and explicit sex scenes where the player can control the pace, position, outfits, lighting, and camera angle.

legal_notice: TAMER KING OF DINOSAURS is a trademark authorized for use by Ride the Lion Studios. © 2024 Ride the Lion Studios. All rights are reserved.
name: Tamer: King of Dinosaurs Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX-6300, Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti, Radeon RX 560X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, Intel Core i7-13700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3070, Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
